entry.title: a bookmark near the end
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,544Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck has travelled so far, but always dodged almost any flight he could take, even if it would make his life easier. Eddie hasn’t pressed about it, but Buck has explained further that it isn’t even because he needed the Jeep by his side at all times, but it is because he has always despised flying.It scares him, sure, but it also makes him feel ill. His stomach twists, his head spins, and he has to fight every urge to throw up. The first time he flew, he spent so long in the bathroom that the air hostess was genuinely concerned he’d passed out in there.And Eddie, like he does with all the information Buck gifts him, folded it up and tucked it into the Buck folder of his brain for safekeeping.Knowing this factoid, Eddie just thinks it’s a little ironic that Buck is dating a pilot.ORTo be loved is to be known.

entry.title: fall in love again and again
entry.summary:
Author: charlieg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,581Chapters: 1/7Kudos: 0

Summary: “Call it destiny, fate, the current—whatever name you want. Some things, you can’t outrun.” Eddie narrows his eyes. “I don’t know if I buy that.” “Then you believe everything could have been different?” He doesn’t need to think. Yes. He knows it in his bones —the endless what-ifs that chew at him every night. What if he’d never enlisted? Been a better husband? Stayed in El Paso? Never joined the 118? Never met— He swallows the last thought. “Guess we’ll never know.” Amelia studies him, her expression unreadable. For a moment she looks older, carrying something that feels too heavy for her years. Eddie shifts under the weight of her gaze. “I guess we’ll never know,” she echoes softly.Or, in every universe, Eddie Diaz finds a way to fall for Evan Buckley. And in every universe, he finds a way to ruin it — until fate decides to give him one last chance to get it right.

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 163,831Chapters: 71/?Kudos: 1,389

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: Brother, I watched the sky burn
entry.summary:
Author: TentativeTreason

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,175Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 605

Summary: The 118 finally learn why Buck is the way he is. Their theory of a cult or a conversion camp was way off. Somehow, though, the reality of being a demi-god isn’t much better. Buck thought they’d be happier to learn he wasn’t part of a cult. **** (i.e. The 118 all struggle with the revelation in different ways. Bobby crashes out learning the Gods exist, Athena’s still wanting justice for Buck’s dead childhood and if Eddie was worried about Anna being a nun, he has no idea how to cope with the literal son of a deity.) **** Part of a series Hearth and Home, Buck is a demi-god, blessed by Hestia.

entry.title: Love Looks a Lot Like This
entry.summary:
Author: bucknroll

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,595Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Buck doesn’t even get a chance to even blink when he wakes up, because his daughter comes crashing into his room. “Dad! Please help, Eddie’s trying to cook and is about to make the smoke alarm go off!” Mia says quickly. Buck doesnt even get a chance to think before he hears the smoke alarm going off, Buck jumps out of bed and he and Mia walk into the kitchen. They see Eddie putting the pan in the sink putting water into it, while Christopher uses his crutches to help him stand as he uses a towel to blow the smoke out of the window. Mia helps Christopher sit down as Buck gets on a stool and turns the smoke alarm off. Once Buck finishes turning the alarm off he stares at Eddie with a sturn face. “I was trying to make pancakes” Eddie says quietly and then they all burst into laughter. Or ~ Buck has a teenage daughter named Mia, Eddie and Buck have been dating for a year and a half and they all live together. Christopher has a great older sister, and Mia figures out her sexuality. Eddie and Buck get married!

entry.title: Not Straight With a Side of Feelings
entry.summary:
Author: WillowHoneybee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,122Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 146

Summary: Eddie and Chris had moved back to LA, back to their home (a home that, much to Eddie’s delight, belongs to Buck too), and everything has started to feel right again. With this newfound peace, Eddie has decided to really take that hot priest’s juice analogy to heart. And through his journey to joy, he’s realized two very important things: He is definitely gay.He is in love with his best friend/current roommate The only other person besides Eddie who knows is Chris, who has given his approval and agreed to keep it a secret. He still hasn’t told Buck because he knows that if he tells him he’s gay, he’ll probably blurt out that he’s head over heels in love with him, too. And Eddie doesn’t know how Buck feels—and the fear of ruining the precious relationship they already have has made it an incredibly difficult topic to bring up. So that’s how Eddie has come to find his new favorite pastime—daydreaming about the beautiful future he’s imagined for Buck and himself. Or, Eddie accidentally tells Buck he has been imagining their future children and acts super normal about it. Buck makes a lasagna.

entry.title: You've Got to Run to Win
entry.summary:
Author: Frawg_Spawn

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,019Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 304

Summary: "Can't he read?" Karen asks, sounding genuinely concerned."Of course he can read," Eddie shoots back defensively. "Buck can do anything. He's so smart. He knows about every single thing that's ever happened." He doesn't care if that's an exaggeration, he has to do Buck's extensive knowledge of obscure subjects justice. "Sometimes I stay up at night just to listen to him talk," Eddie admits dreamily."Oh, Eddie." Karen's face scrunches up and her eyes well as she presses a hand over her heart. "That's so sweet. You two are going to be the cutest couple.""I know," Eddie sniffs and wipes at his eyes. "Buck is going to be the best boyfriend in the whole world."-Or, Eddie and Karen are left unattended at wine night and scheme together to get Buck to be Eddie's boyfriend

entry.title: outside the box
entry.summary:
Author: WabiSabiPapi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,249Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: This dumb little flat box with a screen gives him far too much access—too many opportunities to act like a fool. He has the sudden urge to chuck it over the railing and listen to it shatter into a billion little pieces on the floor below. He sort of wants to hurl himself over the railing, too. He could join his stupid, evil phone in a mess of broken glass and bones downstairs, and all his problems would be solved. He probably should have done that before he sent that damn SOS text. Really, he should have had his phone privileges revoked ages ago.   Things get a little confusing after Buck and Eddie sext for the first time. Obviously, the only solution is to keep on sexting.

entry.title: You Belong With Me
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,811Chapters: 9/20Kudos: 301

Summary: Cat Valentine never thought she had a dad. She has been living with her grandma since she can remember. Her mom left when she was really young. Her grandma always said her parents got pregnant during high school. Evan Buckley never knew his high school girlfriend got pregnant. She picked up and moved one day with her mom, her mom got a job in LA so they left Hersery. When Cat is 14, she finds her birth certificate and learns her father is Evan Buckley. She is determined to meet him. Luckily she still lives in LA, and goes to Hollywood Arts. Buck has just returned back to work after the lawsuit and is on the outs with his family. [You do not need to watch Victorious] You may have noticed I'm having an obsession with extremely RANDOM crossovers 🤷🫣🤣

entry.title: Shower With My Clothes On
entry.summary:
Author: Luneclairevoyante

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,814Chapters: 2/8Kudos: 7

Summary: Evan got out of the car, breathing in the scent of water and wet humus. A barrier stood at the edge of a cliff, the lake at its foot. The urge to put himself in danger, to do something stupid and reckless gut-wrenched him as soon as he saw the opportunity. He climbed onto the fence, tiptoeing the edge.The boy wobbled, his heart skipping a beat. Wild with emotion, his arms flailed in the air to stabilize him as a peak of adrenaline rushed through his veins. That felt so good. Focusing his mind on the not-so-easy task of keeping his balance, he let a wide grin show on his lips for the first time in days.”Evan!” Margaret shrieked, and the surprise made him fall over, on the good side of the cliff, though. The boy tumbled at his mother’s feet as she pressed at his side.Now, he wasn’t invisible.☆✼★━━━━━━━━━━━━★✼☆Or, the Buckley’s move to Texas to avoid going to Maddie’s wedding. Sixteen-year-old Buck end up in Eddie’s school. Drama ensues.Or (bis), just a pretext for me to write about Buck’s and Eddie’s childhood trauma

entry.title: Ten Days To Tell You
entry.summary:
Author: railmehotchner

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,168Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 41

Summary: My advice is always ruin the friendship,Better that than regret it for all time,Should've kissed you anyway.And my advice is always answer the question,Better that than to ask it all your life,Should've kissed you anyway. Brain cancer, the words feel foreign yet all too familiar. It’s a death sentence. Maybe not now but eventually he knows it will be. After everything he’s lived through, all the fantastical and downright bizarre situations he’s found himself in, this is what’s finally gonna get him. Something he can’t outrun no matter how hard he tries. Well, he’s done running. He’s done hiding. Maybe this could be the thing that finally frees him, as sick as it feels to admit. Aka: After a sudden diagnosis, Eddie Diaz is left reeling with unanswered questions and what ifs. Ten days, that’s all he’s got. Ten days to decide if he’ll take the surgery and to come clean about the feelings he’s been experiencing for his best friend. A/N: Guys this fic means so much to me. Thank you to everyone who takes time out of their days to read my little stories. I love you all ❤️
